title: Distribution of consumer transactions worldwide 2018 , by payment channel
summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response In-store and lowest at Response Smart home device.
The highest Response In-store has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Smart home device.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response In-store has the highest Share of respondents and Smart home device has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response In-store and lowest at Response Smart home device.
The highest Response In-store has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Smart home device.
max_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 41.0 is found at Response In-store and the minimum is found at Smart home device where Response is 2.0.
Response Other online has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The maximum Response In-store has got 20.5 times higher Share of respondents than the minimum Response Smart home device.
Share of respondents at Response In-store is 41.0 , second place is Other online at 14.0, and thirdly is Buy buttons at 9.0.
Similar Share of respondents is found in Response Smart home device, Wearables / contactless, and Other.
The Response Smart home device tends to be 4.47 percent lower than average.
